mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.company_id companyId, CONVERT(a.min_money, decimal(24, 2)) minMoney, CONVERT(a.max_money, decimal(24, 2)) maxMoney, CONVERT(a.jan_rate, decimal(24, 2)) janRate, CONVERT(a.feb_rate, decimal(24, 2)) febRate, CONVERT(a.mar_rate, decimal(24, 2)) marRate, CONVERT(a.apr_rate, decimal(24, 2)) aprRate, CONVERT(a.may_rate, decimal(24, 2)) mayRate, CONVERT(a.jun_rate, decimal(24, 2)) junRate, CONVERT(a.jul_rate, decimal(24, 2)) julRate, CONVERT(a.aug_rate, decimal(24, 2)) augRate, CONVERT(a.sept_rate, decimal(24, 2)) septRate, CONVERT(a.oct_rate, decimal(24, 2)) octRate, CONVERT(a.nov_rate, decimal(24, 2)) novRate, CONVERT(a.dec_rate, decimal(24, 2)) decRate, a.sort_no sortNo FROM company_tax_rate a WHERE a.company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY a.sort_no ASC
